nl.helixsoft.gui.preferences

Class PreferenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.helixsoft.gui.preferences.PreferenceManager

  • public class PreferenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Adapted from PathVisio.

    Loads & saves application preferences

    PreferenceManager is a wrapper of java.util.Properties. It could be argued that java.util.Properties is implemented wrong - it should wrap a HashMap instead of extending it. As it is, the Properties.get() method ignores defaults, whereas the Properties.getProperty() method does take them into account. This class solves that issue.

      • PreferenceManager

        public PreferenceManager(java.io.File propertiesFile,
                 java.util.Properties defaults)
        Parameters:
        defaults - default properties to be used in case a property is not defined in the defaults file. defaults specified in this way take priority over the value of Property.getDefault().
